theEpisodesVideos.title: How it Began
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: Erik recounts the unique musical influences that have informed his journey

theEpisodesVideos.title: Knoblick
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: He becomes a professional banjo player with his bluegrass group, The Knoblick Upper 10,000

theEpisodesVideos.title: The Aspiring Entrepreneur
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: He puts down his banjo to become a producer and publisher, and discovers John Sebastian and Tim Hardin, and records the prototypes of folk rock

theEpisodesVideos.title: Music Magnate
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: Wherein he hits it big with The Lovin' Spoonful and records Tim Hardin, The Charlatans, and The Sopwith Camel

theEpisodesVideos.title: San Francisco Late Sixties
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: Erik moves to San Francisco and goes #1 with Norman Greenbaum and others
theEpisodesVideos.videoTitle: Episode Five - San Francisco Late Sixties

theEpisodesVideos.title: The Eighties and Onward
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: Erik hooks up with Chris Isaak and together they produce some great work, including the classic "Wicked Game
theEpisodesVideos.videoTitle: Episode Seven - The Eighties and Onward

theEpisodesVideos.title: Erik's Musical Journey
theEpisodesVideos.subtext: Watch all of the episodes together in the complete Musical Journey film
theEpisodesVideos.videoTitle: Erik's Musical Journey - The Complete Film
